alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; San Juan River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 29 at 2:53PM MST until January 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with lesser amounts near the New Mexico state line. * WHERE...Four Corners/Upper Dolores River, Animas River Basin and San Juan River Basin. * WHEN...From 5 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; San Juan River Basin
